item.title: The Android Headlines Show Episode 48 Mobile World Congress
item.description: The Android Headlines Show Episode 48 Mobile World Congress Here is the agenda for last nights show, in case you want to follow along. We took some questions, too: Samsung Galaxy S5 Gear 2, Gear Neo, and Gear Fit Sony Xperi Z2 and Z2 Tablet Xperia M2 SmartEyeglass and gaming headset Other stuff Nokia X phones Intel’s new 64-bit processors Qualcomm’s new 64-bit processors MediaTek’s new 64-bit processors Snapdragon 801 SoC SanDisk 128GB microSDXC cards New Lenovo smartphones
item.dc:creator: Android Headlines
item.itunes:summary:
The Android Headlines Show Episode 48 Mobile World Congress
Here is the agenda for last nights show, in case you want to follow along. We took some questions, too:
Samsung
Galaxy S5
Gear 2, Gear Neo, and Gear Fit
Sony
Xperi Z2 and Z2 Tablet
Xperia M2
SmartEyeglass and gaming headset
Other stuff
Nokia X phones
Intel’s new 64-bit processors
Qualcomm’s new 64-bit processors
MediaTek’s new 64-bit processors
Snapdragon 801 SoC
SanDisk 128GB microSDXC cards
New Lenovo smartphones
item.itunes:subtitle:
The Android Headlines Show Episode 48 Mobile World Congress
Here is the agenda for last nights...
